CPU_PROCESS.description: The total percentage of CPU being consumed by the process referenced in the source

CPU_ONE_MIN.description: The 1 minute rolling average of the time to collect the CPU metrics

CPU_FIVE_MIN.description: The 5 minute rolling average of the time to collect the CPU metrics

CPU_FIFTEEN_MIN.description: The 15 minute rolling average of the time to collect the CPU metrics

FILE_ONE_MIN.description: The 1 minute rolling average of the time to collect the file usage metrics

FILE_FIVE_MIN.description: The 5 minute rolling average of the time to collect the file usage metrics

FILE_FIFTEEN_MIN.description: The 15 minute rolling average of the time to collect the file usage metrics

FLOW_ONE_MIN.description: The 1 minute rolling average of the time to collect the flow data

FLOW_FIVE_MIN.description: The 5 minute rolling average of the time to collect the flow data

FLOW_FIFTEEN_MIN.description: The 15 minute rolling average of the time to collect the flow data

GLOBAL_ONE_MIN.description: The 1 minute rolling average of the time to collect all the metrics

GLOBAL_FIVE_MIN.description: The 5 minute rolling average of the time to collect all the metrics

GLOBAL_FIFTEEN_MIN.description: The 15 minute rolling average of the time to collect all the metrics

MEM_ONE_MIN.description: The 1 minute rolling average of the time to collect the memory metrics

MEM_FIVE_MIN.description: The 5 minute rolling average of the time to collect the memory metrics

MEM_FIFTEEN_MIN.description: The 15 minute rolling average of the time to collect the memory metrics

NET_ONE_MIN.description: The 1 minute rolling average of the time to collect the network interface metrics

NET_FIVE_MIN.description: The 5 minute rolling average of the time to collect the network interface metrics

NET_FIFTEEN_MIN.description: The 15 minute rolling average of the time to collect the network interface metrics

OS_ONE_MIN.description: The 1 minute rolling average of the time to collect the OS metrics

OS_FIVE_MIN.description: The 5 minute rolling average of the time to collect the OS metrics

OS_FIFTEEN_MIN.description: The 15 minute rolling average of the time to collect the OS metrics

PROC_ONE_MIN.description: The 1 minute rolling average of the time to collect the process metrics

PROC_FIVE_MIN.description: The 5 minute rolling average of the time to collect the process metrics

PROC_FIFTEEN_MIN.description: The 15 minute rolling average of the time to collect the process metrics

SWAP_ONE_MIN.description: The 1 minute rolling average of the time to collect the swap space metrics

SWAP_FIVE_MIN.description: The 5 minute rolling average of the time to collect the swap space metrics

SWAP_FIFTEEN_MIN.description: The 15 minute rolling average of the time to collect the swap space metrics

USER_ONE_MIN.description: The 1 minute rolling average of the time to collect the user metrics

USER_FIVE_MIN.description: The 5 minute rolling average of the time to collect the user metrics

USER_FIFTEEN_MIN.description: The 15 minute rolling average of the time to collect the user metrics

MEM_PROCESS.description: The total percentage of memory being consumed by the process referenced in the source

RMEM_PROCESS.description: The total number of resident in-memory bytes being consumed by the process referenced in the source

VMEM_PROCESS.description: The total number of virtual memory bytes being consumed by the process referenced in the source

INTERVAL_CPU.description: The interval that the meter is using to capture CPU metrics

INTERVAL_FILE.description: The interval that the meter is using to capture metrics about file usage

INTERVAL_FLOW.description: The interval that the meter is using to capture flow data

INTERVAL_GLOBAL.description: The interval that the meter is using to generally capture metrics

INTERVAL_MEM.description: The interval that the meter is using to capture memory metrics

INTERVAL_NET.description: The interval that the meter is using to capture network interface metrics

INTERVAL_OS.description: The interval that the meter is using to capture metrics about the os

INTERVAL_PROC.description: The interval that the meter is using to capture metrics about the processes

INTERVAL_SWAP.description: The interval that the meter is using to capture metrics about swap space

INTERVAL_USER.description: The interval that the meter is using to capture metrics about the user

TIME_PROCESS.description: The number of seconds that the process referenced in the source has consumed the CPU
